titleInfo.title: Letter No. 44: Rawson Hart Boddam, Lawrence Nilson and Robert Sparks, Political and Secret Department, Bombay Castle, to Edward Galley, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: This letter informs Edward Galley of the decision to separate the Political and Secret Department from the Public Department. The letter goes on to describe the functions of the Political and Secret Department.
